ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T19:43:15 [Issue ID 4000-122125] urn:comicvine:4000-122125
ComicInfo.Summary:
Jackie Estacado, the bearer of the Darkness, has become the head of his mafia family. Now, though, he realizes that the mob wars were the least of his problems. Chinese gangsters have put a price on his head in a sweeping new story arc that combine Hong Kong action, the Sopranos, and a heaping helping of the supernatural! Green Lantern's Ron Marz takes Jackie on the ride of his life.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-02-11 17:35:10. [CVDB122125]
